item.title: Caitlin Clark’s new Nike sneakers sold out within minutes. Now the resale market is booming
item.description: Prices for the Kobe V Protro on the secondary market are already topping $350.

item.title: Teach for All CEO Wendy Kopp says she’s cracked the code on jet lag—and hasn’t experienced it at all since adopting the trick
item.description: Kopp's technique aligns well with the science behind jet lag.

item.title: Figma has filed for an IPO—here are 7 key takeaways
item.description: Design software company Figma has filed for an IPO, which is expected to raise up to $1.5 billion.

item.title: Scattered, smothered, and surcharge free: Waffle House takes its egg surcharge off the menu
item.description: Chain had been charging an extra 50 cents per egg.

item.title: Zillow CEO Jeremy Wacksman is using AI to transform the real estate industry—for buyers, sellers, and agents
item.description: “The one thing we found over the 20 years is anytime you can bring technology to the process, people will consume it," Wacksman told Fortune.
